title: Ankimono
description: Ankimono is a powerful online flashcard for memorizing anything, anywhere, super-efficiently, through spaced repetition. It helps you retain information effectively by reviewing material at optimal intervals. Accessible from any device, Ankimono allows you to create custom decks for languages, maps, and more. With features like image support, Markdown formatting, and CSV import, it's perfect for anyone looking to memorize large amounts of information efficiently. Start today!
